question: What therapies target both TOP1 and ERBB2?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r1:TARGETS]->(g1:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g1.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
MATCH (t)-[r2:TARGETS]->(g2:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g2.symbol) = toLower('ERBB2')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g2.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ERBB2'))
RETURN
  g1.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r1.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r1.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r1.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r1.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(g1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (t)-[r2:TARGETS]->(g2:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g2.symbol) = toLower('NTRK1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g2.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('NTRK1'))
RETURN
  g1.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r1.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r1.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r1.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r1.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r1:TARGETS]->(g1:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g1.symbol) = toLower('FGFR1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR1'))
MATCH (t)-[r2:TARGETS]->(g2:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g2.symbol) = toLower('FGFR3')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g2.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR3'))
RETURN
  g1.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r1.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r1.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r1.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r1.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r1:TARGETS]->(g1:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g1.symbol) = toLower('HDAC10')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HDAC10'))
MATCH (t)-[r2:TARGETS]->(g2:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g2.symbol) = toLower('HDAC9')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g2.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HDAC9'))
RETURN
  g1.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r1.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r1.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r1.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r1.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  coalesce(r1.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100
